about.title: About Zada
about.content: The ZADA Nature Lounge cabin is located 10 km from Cluj-Napoca, on the Feleacu hill, at the edge of Cluj's Faget River. It is divided into two levels: on the ground floor it has a large living room with an extendable sofa, a kitchen equipped with everything you need and a bathroom with a shower. Upstairs are the 3 bedrooms and another bathroom.

activities.title: Activities
activities.content: Adrenalin Park is open in the summer, just 500m from the cottage. In winter, the Feleacu ski area is open, 5 km from the cottage. Right after our fence, the Fagetul Clujului Natura 2000 Site begins, with many trails through the forest; mountain bike trails. An hour's walk away is the Moara de Vant zoo park and Micesti lake, where you can fish.
